name: The verb "strutted" shows how separate Henry felt from his friends and the rest of the world. It helps to create, in a way that "They were proud" does not, the sad and mournful tone of the paragraph.
value: The verb "strutted" shows how separate Henry felt from his friends and the rest of the world. It helps to create, in a way that "They were proud" does not, the sad and mournful tone of the paragraph.
